item.title: Sneak Peek at the SignalR Integration in Wolverine 5.0
item.description: Earlier this week I did a live stream on the upcoming Wolverine 5.0 release where I just lightly touched on the concept for our planned SignalR integration with Wolverine. While there wasn’t that much to show yesterday, a big pull request just landed and I think the APIs and the approach has gelled enough that … Continue reading Sneak Peek at the SignalR Integration in Wolverine 5.0 → Link to article: https://jeremydmiller.
